channel.title: Describe your stance in life with a single sentence
channel.description:
Basically tell us, in a single sentence, what's your general view of the world or society.
I hate most people, because I think they're too stupid to live, no matter how hard they learn from their own mistakes.

item.title: Describe your stance in life with a single sentence
item.dc:creator: Doom
item.description:
Jokerine:

and do the things you like, even if people disagree with you.

Sometimes it is good to listen to others’ opinions, though!

Read full topic

item.title: Describe your stance in life with a single sentence
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
Life is too short to focus on the bad things; enjoy life shamelessly and do the things you like, even if people disagree with you.

(Which usually leads to all those zopmhv ur makin hl2 pink ur ghae fag ololz comments )

Read full topic

item.description:
geekofalltrades:

That applies to me too, but the opposite sometimes applies as well.

item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
sersoft:

Maybe I should shut the fuck up about smoking weed, but then everyone else who says repetitive things should also shut the fuck up and then nobody would have anything to say. Think about it…

Yeah, ok, just shut your pie hole for once!

item.title: Describe your stance in life with a single sentence
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
CTID:

I wasn’t referring to you. When I said “all of you” I was referring to eternalness and (to a certain extent) sersoft who go on and on about how they’re baked constantly. It just grinds on my nerves. I don’t care that they smoke, it just gets really fucking old that they go on and on about it.

“All of you” kind of implies “all of you,” so I assumed you meant all of us.

Read full topic

item.description:
I wasn’t referring to you. When I said “all of you” I was referring to eternalness and (to a certain extent) sersoft who go on and on about how they’re baked constantly. It just grinds on my nerves. I don’t care that they smoke, it just gets really fucking old that they go on and on about it.

item.title: Describe your stance in life with a single sentence
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
CTID:

This. A thousand times this. I have no interest in smoking pot. I don’t care if it has positive or negative effects, it just really doesn’t appeal to me. But I find it incredibly annoying when all of you pothead fuckstains go around everyday on the forums saying you’re blazed out of your fucking skull and how fucking awesome you are for doing so.

Where do you get the idea that everyone who does weed goes on about it constantly? Surely you wouldn’t notice the ones that don’t?

I haven’t mentioned weed any more on this forum than I would hot dogs when I’m hungry, tbh.

Read full topic
item.source: Describe your stance in life with a single sentence
